channel.title: CVE Feed for Moxa -- PT-G503 Series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Moxa -- PT-G503 Series

item.title: CVE-2023-5035|2024-08-02T07:44:53.722Z -- moxa -- pt-g503%20series
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in PT-G503 Series firmware versions prior to v5.2, where the Secure attribute for sensitive cookies in HTTPS sessions is not set, which could cause the cookie to be transmitted in plaintext over an HTTP session. The vulnerability may lead to security risks, potentially exposing user session data to unauthorized access and manipulation.

item.title: CVE-2023-4217|2024-08-02T07:17:12.234Z -- moxa -- pt-g503%20series
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in PT-G503 Series versions prior to v5.2, where the session cookies attribute is not set properly in the affected application. The vulnerability may lead to security risks, potentially exposing user session data to unauthorized access and manipulation.
